This function obtains geometric features at point level

subset_matrix_by_indices.Rd

This function obtains geometric features at point level

Usage

subset_matrix_by_indices(mat,
                         index_lists,
                         dist,
                         First_eigenvalue = TRUE,
                         Second_eigenvalue = TRUE,
                         Third_eigenvalue = TRUE,
                         Sum_of_eigenvalues = TRUE,
                         PCA_1 = TRUE,
                         PCA_2 = TRUE,
                         Anisotropy = TRUE,
                         Planarity = TRUE,
                         Linearity = TRUE,
                         Surface_variation = TRUE,
                         Normal_change_rate = TRUE,
                         Verticality = TRUE,
                         Number_of_points = TRUE,
                         omnivariance = TRUE,
                         eigenentropy = TRUE,
                         surface_density = TRUE,
                         volume_density = TRUE,
                         threads = 1,
                         solver_thresh = 50000)
